パッケージ com.shimizukenta.secs.secs1ontcpip

Implementation package providing SECS-I(SEMI-E4)-on-TCP/IP Communicator, Message.
  • インタフェースの概要
    インタフェース 説明
    Secs1OnTcpIpCommunicator
    This instance is implementation of SECS-I (SEMI-E4) on TCP/IP.
    Secs1OnTcpIpReceiverCommunicator
    This instance is implementation of SECS-I (SEMI-E4) on TCP/IP-Receiver.
  • クラスの概要
    クラス 説明
    Secs1OnTcpIpCommunicatorConfig
    This class is confit of SECS-I-on-TCP/IP-Communicator.
    Secs1OnTcpIpReceiverCommunicatorConfig
    This class is config of SECS-I-on-TCP/IP-Receiver-Communicator.
  • 例外の概要
    例外 説明
    Secs1OnTcpIpDetectTerminateException
    SECS-I-on-TCP/IP detect terminate Exception.
    Secs1OnTcpIpNotConnectedException
    SECS-I-on-TCP/IP NOT connected Exception.
